problem_names:
lemma Sigma_transfer[transfer_rule]:
  assumes [transfer_rule]: "right_total A"
  shows 
    "(rel_set A ===> (A ===> rel_set B) ===> rel_set (rel_prod A B))
      Sigma Sigma"
translations:
lemma Sigma_transfer[transfer_rule]:
  assumes [transfer_rule]: "right_total A"
  shows 
    "(rel_set A ===> (A ===> rel_set B) ===> rel_set (rel_prod A B))
      Sigma Sigma"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (rel_set A ===> (A ===> rel_set B) ===> rel_set (rel_prod A B)) Sigma
     Sigma

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (rel_set A ===> (A ===> rel_set B) ===> rel_set (rel_prod A B))
     (\<lambda>A B. \<Union>x\<in>A. \<Union>y\<in>B x. {(x, y)})
     (\<lambda>A B. \<Union>x\<in>A. \<Union>y\<in>B x. {(x, y)})
